name: The Meat Grinder
description: You have been dumped into a meat grinder that holds a collection of every doom monster that sucks a bloody breath from all of your dead friends. Look hard and you may get lucky; run fast and don't stop to smell the blood and you won't make it. At certain points the monsters become wimpy, spineless, jellyfish and actually help you by killing their own. JUST REMEMBER ONE THING: REAL "MEN" DON'T USE -CHEAT- CODES.
